name: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Discharge Method
description: The method of discharge from a Hospital Provider Spell.

concept.display: Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
Patient discharged him/herself or was discharged by a relative or advocate
Patient discharged by mental health review tribunal, Home Secretary or Court

concept.definition: National Codes 6 and 7 have been introduced for the Mental Health Services Data Set only to add further granularity to National Code 2. However, National Code 2 is still valid for the Mental Health Services Data Set where extra detail cannot be collected. National Codes 6 and 7 are NOT valid in any other data set including Commissioning Data Set version 6-2.
